meanings.definition: The actions or behavior of a mountebank.
meanings.sent1: His mountebankery on stage fooled many people.
meanings.sent2: The mountebankery of the street performer was entertaining.
meanings.sent3: The mountebankery of the magician left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her mountebankery was like a carefully crafted illusion.
meanings.sent5: The mountebankery of the con artist was finally exposed.

meanings.definition: Deceptive or fraudulent practices used by a mountebank.
meanings.sent1: The mountebankery of the scam artist was uncovered by the police.
meanings.sent2: She fell victim to the mountebankery of the fake psychic.
meanings.sent3: The mountebankery of the salesman was so obvious in hindsight.
meanings.sent4: His mountebankery was like a trap waiting to be sprung.
meanings.sent5: The mountebankery of the fraudster was elaborate and convincing.
